com.aurel.track.admin.server.siteConfig

Class SiteConfigBL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.admin.server.siteConfig.SiteConfigBL

  • public class SiteConfigBL
extends java.lang.Object
    Business logic class for TSite. It manages handling of the server configuration like license management, incoming and outgoing e-mail connections, LDAP, etc.

        Parameters:

        licenseTO - the transfer object with the license data
